title: LPQ for leaving a game at 41 min mark and the game last for 42 mins wtf @riot
body: i left a game that we were losing at the 41 min mark and the game lasted 42 mins and i got a 20 min LPQ thats b.s. i actually hate the riot system for the LPQ it makes no sense. i get it when i leave at 10 mins or whatever but 41 mins that is bull. i get LPQ so often for leaving a game for 2 mins when others leave so early and dont get LPQ. riot please lift my ban cause it takes too long for me to work it off and i shouldnt have it in the first place!

replies.body:
While the game you left only lasted another minute before ending, this was still a game where you abandoned your team. It may not have seemed like it, but leaving your 4 other teammates could have been the deciding factor in why they lost. 

Since a losing game can always be turned around, you will still get hit with LPQ after leaving multiple matches. In the future, try to remember that you always have a fighting chance. By leaving your team you're only helping the other team win.
Why do I get so many trolls who when the team declines to surrender they just go afk farm or walk around
Why did you leave with only 1 minute left?
